title: Evidence Manifest
description: A manifest of all evidence files for a given commit.

commit.description: The git commit SHA this evidence was generated for.

generatedAt.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp when the evidence was generated.

files.description: A list of evidence files and their hashes.

path.description: The path to the evidence file, relative to the artifact root.

sha256.description: The SHA256 hash of the file's contents.
